sentences.sContent: She was so disloyal to her deputy she made his position untenable.
sentences.sCn: 她对她的副手如此不忠诚，以至于弄得他的职位岌岌可危。

synos.tran: 不忠的；不忠诚的；背叛的

words.tran: 不忠实；不义，不贞；背信弃义

trans.tranCn: 不忠的；不忠诚的；背叛的
trans.tranOther: doing or saying things that do not support your friends, your country, or the group you belong to
